sqlMap.select: SELECT /* PACA0040.SEARCH00 광고주 순번 목록 조회 */ DISTINCT CASE WHEN CUST_NAME LIKE '%농심%' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS ORDERNO , A.TAXY_MONT , A.CUST_CODE /* 광고주코드 */ , A.CUST_NAME /* 광고주명 */ , TO_NUMBER(B.CUST_SEQX) CUST_SEQX /* 광고주순번 */ , A.TAXY_MONT /*세금계산서년월*/ FROM PD_SATXXH A LEFT JOIN PD_SEQXXM B ON A.CUST_CODE = B.CUST_CODE AND A.TAXY_MONT = B.TAXY_MONT WHERE A.TAXY_MONT = #YEAR_MNTH# AND A.CUST_CODE IS NOT NULL AND A.INPT_GUBN IS NULL ORDER BY CUST_SEQX, ORDERNO

SELECT /* PACA0040.SEARCH01 매체코드 순번 목록 조회 */ DISTINCT A.TAXY_MONT , A.MEDA_CODE AS CLAS_CODE /* 매체코드 */ , B.CLAS_NAME AS CLAS_NAME /* 매체명 */ , TO_NUMBER(C.CLAS_SEQX) CLAS_SEQX /* 매체순번 */ , A.TAXY_MONT /*세금계산서년월*/ FROM PD_SATXXH A LEFT JOIN PD_CODEXM B ON A.MEDA_CODE = B.CLAS_CODE LEFT JOIN PD_SEQXXM C ON A.MEDA_CODE = C.CLAS_CODE AND A.TAXY_MONT = C.TAXY_MONT WHERE A.TAXY_MONT = #YEAR_MNTH# AND A.INPT_GUBN IS NULL ORDER BY CLAS_SEQX,A.MEDA_CODE

SELECT /* PACA0040.SEARCH02 매체사 순번 목록 조회 */ DISTINCT CASE WHEN A.MEMO_FILD LIKE '%농심%' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS ORDERNO , A.TAXY_MONT , C.JOBN_NUMB AS JOBN_NUMB /* 제작의뢰번호 */ , A.MEMO_FILD AS JOBN_NAME /* 제작의뢰명 */ , TO_NUMBER(B.JOBN_SEQX) JOBN_SEQX /* 매체사순번 */ , A.TAXY_MONT /*세금계산서년월*/ FROM PD_SATXXH A LEFT JOIN PD_SATXXD C ON A.TAXX_NUMB = C.TAXX_NUMB AND A.TAXY_MONT = C.TAXY_MONT AND C.TAXX_IDXX = '1' LEFT JOIN PD_SEQXXM B ON A.TAXY_MONT = B.TAXY_MONT AND C.JOBN_NUMB = B.JOBN_NUMB WHERE A.TAXY_MONT = #YEAR_MNTH# AND A.INPT_GUBN IS NULL ORDER BY JOBN_SEQX, ORDERNO
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PD_SEQXXM( /* PACA0040.SAVE00 광고주 순번 입력 */ TAXY_MONT ,CUST_CODE ,CUST_SEQX )VALUES( #TAXY_MONT# ,#CUST_CODE# ,#CUST_SEQX# )
INSERT INTO PD_SEQXXM( /* PACA0040.SAVE00 매체구분 순번 입력 */ TAXY_MONT ,CLAS_CODE ,CLAS_SEQX )VALUES( #TAXY_MONT# ,#CLAS_CODE# ,#CLAS_SEQX# )
INSERT INTO PD_SEQXXM( /* PACA0040.SAVE00 매체사코드 순번 입력 */ TAXY_MONT ,JOBN_NUMB ,JOBN_SEQX )VALUES( #TAXY_MONT# ,#JOBN_NUMB# ,#JOBN_SEQX# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PD_SEQXXM /* PACA0040.UPDATE00 광고주 순번 수정 */ SET CUST_SEQX = #CUST_SEQX# /* 광고주순번 */ WHERE CUST_CODE=#CUST_CODE# AND TAXY_MONT = #TAXY_MONT#
UPDATE PD_SEQXXM /* PACA0040.UPDATE01 매체 순번 수정 */ SET CLAS_SEQX = #CLAS_SEQX# /* 매체순번 */ WHERE CLAS_CODE=#CLAS_CODE# AND TAXY_MONT = #TAXY_MONT#
UPDATE PD_SEQXXM /* PACA0040.UPDATE02 매체사 순번 수정 */ SET JOBN_SEQX = #JOBN_SEQX# /* 매체사순번 */ WHERE JOBN_NUMB=#JOBN_NUMB# AND TAXY_MONT = #TAXY_MONT#
sqlMap.select: SELECT /* PACA0040.getCUST_CODE 광고주코드 조회 */ COUNT(CUST_CODE) FROM PD_SEQXXM WHERE CUST_CODE=#CUST_CODE# AND TAXY_MONT = #TAXY_MONT#
SELECT /* PACA0040.getCLAS_CODE 매체구분 조회 */ COUNT(CLAS_CODE) FROM PD_SEQXXM WHERE CLAS_CODE=#CLAS_CODE# AND TAXY_MONT = #TAXY_MONT#
SELECT /* PACA0040.getJOBN_NUMB 매체사코드 조회 */ COUNT(JOBN_SEQX) FROM PD_SEQXXM WHERE JOBN_NUMB=#JOBN_NUMB# AND TAXY_MONT = #TAXY_MONT#
